scripts.build:js: npx esbuild assets/js/filter-blog.js --bundle --minify --outfile=assets/js/filter-blog.min.js && npx esbuild assets/js/toc.js --bundle --minify --outfile=assets/js/toc.min.js && npx esbuild assets/js/zenlu.js --bundle --minify --outfile=assets/js/zenlu.min.js && npx esbuild assets/js/misc.js --bundle --minify --outfile=assets/js/misc.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && bundle exec jekyll build && npm run build:thumbnails
scripts.watch:js: concurrently "npm run watch:filter-blog" "npm run watch:toc" "npm run watch:zenlu" "npm run watch:misc"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run watch:css" "npm run watch:js" "bundle exec jekyll serve" "npm run watch:thumbnails"
